analysis.description:
Avatarium.purchase (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#271-318) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#307-308)

Avatarium._payout (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#441-448) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- addressCEO.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#443)
	- _to.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#446-447)

ERC721 (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#80-106) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#81-82)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#87-89)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#89-90)

Avatarium (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#106-449) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#224-232)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#364-371)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#348-357)
_price in Avatarium._createAvatar (/unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#396-397) is a local variable never initialiazed

Avatarium.ownerOf.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#264) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#62-65)

Avatarium.getAvatar.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#249) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/11/0x7f5059cc888744e2812c6f693a727e9d787189ec.sol#62-65)
